profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.
service_area: Alberta, Manitoba, Southwestern and Northwestern Ontario
products: replacement windows, vinyl windows, basement windows, casement windows, double hung windows, awning windows, custom windows, energy efficient windows, energy start windows

profile:
Over the last 30 years, Abney Roofing has assembled a great team of professionals. Our goal from the beginning has been to provide our customers with a quality roof at a reasonable cost. From our reception and sales, roofing crews and trades to our support services and quality control inspectors, Abney roofing is determined to provide the best possible service for our customers.

Whether you need a roof repair or a new roof on your home, strata property or commercial property, we promise to take care of all your roofing needs in an honest, efficient and professional manner.
service_area: North & West Vancouver, Vancouver, Burnaby, Richmond, New Westminster, Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam, Surrey, Delta, Langley, Abbotsford & Mission

specialities: Since our inception, Abney Roofing has developed relationships with some of the largest Property Management Firms in Metro Vancouver. As a result, Abney Roofing conducts routine inspections, maintenance and repairs at hundreds of strata properties in the Lower Mainland. We operate a full-time strata maintenance/repair and carpentry division that is capable of responding to and taking care of most strata maintenance and repair requirements within a timely manner. We also operate an emergency service line 24/7 to meet the specific needs of property management companies and strata complexes at any time during an emergency. Abney Roofing is dedicated to the relationships we have developed since our company
warranty_terms: 10-12 Year Workmanship Guarantee (3-5 Star Warranties Available)

profile:
Knights Insulation Ltd. is a family owned company that has been in business for over 30 years.
Since its establishment in 1980, Knights Insulation have continued their commitment to doing quality work, whilst maintaining excellent relations with their customers, contractors & employees.
Knights Insulation are fully insured, bonded and A+ members of the Better Business Bureau since 1999.
Knights Insulations is British Columbia's Premier Green Insulation & Soundproofing Specialists.
All the insulation used is free of formaldehyde, which is one of the most hazardous compounds to ecosystems and human health. All of the products used contain a minimum of 40% recycled material, to provide a sustainable future for our children.
name: Knights Insulation Ltd

profile:
We are passionate about what we do.

That’s the Ocean Drywall & Renovation difference.

For years, we have been researching, working in and perfecting our craft so that we can come to you with the knowledge, expertise and detail-oriented mindset which sets us apart from your average professional drywall company. We knew when we started that we wanted to stand above the rest, to go the extra mile for every client, every day. To do this, we knew we had to be so much more than drywall professionals – we had to be craftsmen, artisans, and a customer-service-driven team bent on solving old problems in new ways, under budget and on time.

In this way, we are able to bring a different kind of drywall service to your door, whether that door is to your home, your business, or your industrial complex. Whether you need a new construction drywall expert or you are looking to do simple renovations, we are the experts who can get you the results you are looking for, and our work is designed to last.

Because our drywall contractors are driven by our customers’ experience with us, we work with you, every step of the way, really getting to know you and your space on a personal level so that we can work to build walls and client relationships that last a lifetime. We pride ourselves on our ability to provide both excellent service and quality work for some of the most competitive prices on the market.

Whether you are looking for a drywall contractor to do drywall repairs, installations or need water damage restoration in your home or business, we are just the team for you. We will provide you with friendly and quality service that you can depend on.

Contact us today to learn more about what we can do for you, and see why Vancouver Island customers love our drywall services. It’s time for you to sit back, relax, and trust the professionals who do every job with precision. Call now!

profile:
In business over 20 years, BP Insulation is a family owned and operated, full service insulation contractor. Launched in the very early days of BC Hydro’s powersmart program, BP Insulation was the insulation installer of choice for several of the powersmart program’s registered contractors. We attended all the BC Hydro powersmart seminars, for contractors and tradesmen alike, and quickly adopted powersmart’s “Better than building code” principles. These early years, in keeping up with the demand for outstanding customer service,  we ran more than one truck, trailer and machine, into the ground. With boundless energy, we kept pace with numerous contractors, all vying for the high customer satisfaction, that only BP Insulation could consistently deliver.

BP Today,

With the evolution of the family and a labrynthine network of contacts, tradesmen and support staff, BP Insulation has become a powerhouse, full service, insulation contractor in Vancouver’s lower mainland area. Our expertise and services have grown to include, attic vacuum and decontamination, drill and fill wall- ceiling-floor insulation, 2 lb spray foam applications, soundproofing, kitchen and bath ventilation upgrades, crawlspace reconditioning, whole home draftproofing complete with combustion safety and negative pressure testing, as well as mold, moisture, humidity troubleshooting and correction services.
With a fleet of trucks, trailers, heavy equipment and one of the finest 2 lb spray foam setups in western Canada, you can rest assured that your work will be done fast, efficiently, and with the same honour and integrity that made BP Insulation what it is today.

Services: Spray Foam, Blown Insulation, Attic Decontamination Services,
Drill and Fill Insulation and Soundproofing
